Name: The Mystery of Happyville
About the game: The Mystery of Happyville is a short action-adventure-horror game, playable for up to 4 players locally (on the same machine). A mystery to be uncovered A quiet little town has now cut off all contact with the outside world, and it is up to a band of intrepid detectives to uncover the sinister secrets that lie beneath the surface. Local co-op Experience the horror with up to 4 friends as the detective squad seeks to uncover the darkness that lies within Controller support The Mystery of Happyville is best experienced with gamepads or controllers - please note, you may require a mouse and/or keyboard in order to launch the game and navigate the main menu.
